title: Can NIOS students take the JEE exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can NIOS has full credibility as that of any other higher and secondary education board in the country. Infact you can apply for jee as well as Neet which was not possible earlier for students (2014 & 2015 situation). That being said you can also apply for manipal, SRM, Comedk etc . Also a list of institution taking NIOS students has been prepared and uploaded on its website which is legit and no one can deny you the admission. Look for institution not mentioned ,in this case or example Amity is a major private instituton which didn't accept my form as I was a NIOS student. I was filling for the exam form for amity in 2016. Rest be assured every govt institution accepts NIOS.

A2A Yes,why not ,NIOS(National Institute Of Open Schooling) is a recognised open school.Taking into consideration all the eligibility criteria,you can absolutely take the Jee exam. You are eligible for many other engineering entrance exams too.Refer to my answer, Saumya Tiwari's answer to Can I get admission in b tech through NIOS? Good Luck!
Yes. NIOS certificates are legally valid in all institutes and universities in India. As it is a board under central government like CBSE and CISCE.
As it is recognized government board so yes you can apply for JEE exam. Best of luck for it.
